mapper.select:
SELECT g.goods_no, g.goods_name, p.price, p.discount, p.discount_rate, g.hit, g.image_name FROM goods g LEFT JOIN price p ON g.goods_no = p.goods_no AND p.sale_startDate <= CURDATE() AND CURDATE() <= p.sale_endDate WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY g.goods_no DESC LIMIT #{perPageNum} OFFSET #{limit}
mapper.insert:
select no, title, content, writer, write_date AS writeDate, hit
from goods where no = #{no}
